" Future Potential Google Inc. 's Eric Schmidt said in a separate interview at the World Economic Forum that the high value attributed to some young companies is on par with their future potential. The e-commerce space feels overheated because valuations are based on long-term revenue expectations, said Eric Schmidt , who plans to step down from his role as CEO and become executive chairman in April.
